instruction: Calculate the length of the diagonal of a square with sides of length 4.
output: The length of the diagonal of a square with sides of length 4 is 5.656854249492381.

instruction: In what year was the American Declaration of Independence signed?
output: The American Declaration of Independence was signed in 1776.

instruction: List five Latin American countries.
output: Five Latin American countries are Mexico, Brazil, Colombia, Peru, and Argentina.

instruction: What is the story of Persephone?
output: The story of Persephone is an ancient Greek myth. Persephone, daughter of the gods Demeter and Zeus, was abducted by Hades, the god of the underworld, and taken to the underworld as his wife and queen. Demeter begins to grieve the loss of her daughter, bringing the world into cold and darkness until Zeus sends Hermes to retrieve her from the underworld. Persephone then splits her time between the underworld and the world of the gods.

instruction: Classify the following statement as true or false:  "A healthy diet consists of only vegetables and fruit."
output: False. A healthy diet consists of a variety of nutritious foods including vegetables, fruit, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats.

instruction: Generate a purchase order
output: We hereby order 1000 pens from XYZ Suppliers. The items should be delivered to ABC Company within 10 days of placing the order. Please provide us with an itemized invoice for the items. Thank you for your prompt attention.

instruction: Describe a way to make long meetings more productive.
output: In order to make long meetings more productive, it is important to have a clear agenda and structure. Every meeting should have a specific purpose, and it is important to make sure that everyone involved is aware of the purpose and the goals of the meeting. During the meeting, it is important to stay on topic and take structured breaks when needed. Allocating specific tasks to teams can also help move the meeting along.

instruction: Develop a program that can generate a sentence using a given set of words.
output: The amazing world is full of endless possibilities.

instruction: Describe how gender roles have changed in the last 50 years.
output: Gender roles have changed significantly over the last 50 years. Women are no longer expected to adhere to traditional domestic roles, with more women becoming active in the workforce and pursuing higher education. Men on the other hand, are becoming more involved in the home and are often sharing in tasks traditionally reserved for women. Gender roles are evolving to become more equal, with both men and women having access to the same opportunities.

instruction: Make a 3-piece pizza with these ingredients: mushrooms, olives, bell peppers.
output: The pizza will be prepared with a homemade sauce, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, olives, and bell peppers. The mushrooms and olives will be spread evenly over the pizza, while the bell peppers will be diced and added as topping. The pizza will then be baked in an oven until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted.

instruction: Classify 3 professions as either physical or non-physical.
output:
Teacher: Non-Physical 
Architect: Non-Physical
Housekeeper: Physical

instruction: Find the height of Mount Everest in feet.
output: Mount Everest is 29,029 feet (8850 meters) tall.

instruction: Create a sentence using these 3 words: knowledge, combat, resolve.
output: Through knowledge we can combat any issue and resolve any obstacles.

instruction: State the amount of money needed to start a business in California.
output: In California, the costs for starting a business can vary depending on the nature and size of the business, but typically range from $50 to $800 for filing fees and licenses. In addition, most businesses will require capital to cover operating expenses such as equipment, staff, and supplies.

instruction: Identify this Star Wars character: "A human female who served in the Rebel Alliance and fought alongside Luke Skywalker during the Battle of Yavin."
output: The character is General Leia Organa.

instruction: Analyze these lyrics: "Just a small town girl, living in a lonely world".
output: The lyrics suggest a person in a small town who feels disconnected and isolated. The phrase "lonely world" implies that the person may feel like they are the only one in their situation, with no one to relate to.

instruction: Write a web crawler program that collects all posts from a given website.
output: The web crawler program should be able to scan the website and collect any posts from the given website. It should also be able to store the posts in a database for further analysis. The program should be able to traverse the website by following internal links to other pages and identify new posts to be collected.

instruction: Translate the word "jaloux" in English.
output: The English translation of the word "jaloux" is "jealous".

instruction: Describe the process for making a PB&J sandwich.
output: Spread a layer of peanut butter on one side of the bread and jelly on the other side. Place the sides together and press down slightly to ensure the sandwich stays together. Cut the sandwich in half or in triangles and enjoy!

instruction: Select the most appropriate movie for a 7-year-old boy
output: A suitable movie for a 7-year-old boy would be Moana, an animated adventure about a Polynesian princess who sets sail on a daring mission to save her people.
